DOC.brief_summary: Purpose: Characterize the profile of tympanometric patients with cleft lip and palate in the post surgery period and correlate it with the time of palatoplasty. Methods: The sample consisted of 16 patients with cleft lip or palate totaling 32 ears treated at a Public University Hospital in Cuiab√° (MT)- Brazil, in the post surgery moment that varied from three months to 33 years. Were sampled patients of both sexes, pediatrics and adults.
DOC.criteria: cleft incisive trans unilateral or bilateral postforamen complete or incomplete isolated cleft lip associated syndromes malformation of ear
